title: Trolls of Troy 11-15 (Scanlation)
description:
Issues 11-15 of 'Trolls of Troy'

Soleil Productions, 2007-2011, 54 pages each

Written by Christophe Arleston

Illustrated by Jean-Louis Mourier

Colors by Claude Guth

Troy is a world populated by humans, trolls and other creatures and filled with magic. The trolls are physically strong, and viewed by humans as wild animals, but they are civilized from their own point of view.

Trolls of Troy is set two centuries before the story of Lanfeust. It tells the story of TetrÃƒÂ¤m, a brave troll, and his adopted human daughter, Waha. Men have decided to exterminate the trolls, and have formed a group of hunters with terrible powers. TetrÃƒÂ¤m, must find a way to save his people.
